lead_paragraph: The claps and cheers as Zach LaVine walked into the room were loud, audible to everyone in the school as the Minnesota Timberwolves guard arrived and waved to the crowd.

headline.print_headline: Zach LaVine Uses Slam Dunk Winnings to Help Deaf School
headline.main: Zach LaVine Uses Slam Dunk Winnings to Help Deaf School
